scripts.dev: nodemon -w . -w src/test/resources -w src/main/resources -e yaml,json,conf -x npm -- run build
scripts.docs: shx rm -Rf build/docs && shx mkdir -p build/docs && shx cp src/main/resources/openapi.yaml build/docs && shx cp src/main/resources/*.json build/docs && shx cp src/main/resources/generated/* build/docs
scripts.publish-docs: npm run docs && gh-pages -b docs -d build/docs
